item.description:
NE Pilots Group is heading there and I think we should go as well. We are having our own in October and it would be nice to see how it's done and enjoy the flight...

I think if we leave early and leave to come back early, we'll miss most of the traffic there...

Candlelight Farms (11N)
67 Hubble Hill Rd
New Milford, CT 06776
860-354-4681

This is a 2900 ft turf field. Nice... C'mon..... about 96 nms. Good flight. check the airnav link below.
http://www.airnav.com...

This is a huge event held at Candlelight Farms (11N) with antique planes and cars. 8am - 4pm. For more information, see http://www.blackhorse...

The event is hosted by Black Horse Automotive Services Inc.

I wonder if Matt The Wonder Boy can make a nice site like this for us on our webpage????

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Wings and Wheels at 11N , New Milford Ct.
